name: RetinalVascularOcclusion
title: Retinal Vascular Occlusion
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for diagnoses of retinal vascular occlusion.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of retinal vein or artery occlusion.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent a diagnosis for 'unspecified eye.')
